Trade/Device Name(s): CareSens N Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CareSens N Single Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CareSens N Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using amperometric technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by people with diabetes at home to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips and alternative sites; not for use on neonates or diagnosis/screening of diabetes.
